snippet: Pimco intends to expand its equities business and there will be no difference in the firm's portfolio management following the departure of former Chief Investment Officer Bill Gross, two top Pimco executives said on Tuesday....

headline.print_headline: Pimco CEO Says Firm to Expand Equities Business: CNBC
headline.main: Pimco CEO Says Firm to Expand Equities Business: CNBC

lead_paragraph: Pimco intends to expand its equities business and there will be no difference in the firm's portfolio management following the departure of former Chief Investment Officer Bill Gross, two top Pimco executives said on Tuesday.
